Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
A smile is a curve that sets everything straight.
Colors are the smiles of nature.
Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
Wrinkles will only go where the smiles have been.
A warm smile is the universal language of kindness.
Be thou the rainbow in the storms of life. The evening beam that smiles the clouds away, and tints tomorrow with prophetic ray.
We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
A smile is the light in your window that tells others that there is a caring, sharing person inside.
Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
After every storm the sun will smile; for every problem there is a solution, and the soul's indefeasible duty is to be of good cheer.
Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose.
If the world's a veil of tears, Smile till rainbows span it.
Look back, and smile on perils past.
A gentle word, a kind look, a good-natured smile can work wonders and accomplish miracles.
What sunshine is to flowers, smiles are to humanity. These are but trifles, to be sure; but scattered along life's pathway, the good they do is inconceivable.
They might not need me; but they might. I'll let my head be just in sight; a smile as small as mine might be precisely their necessity.
Always keep your smile. That's how I explain my long life.
Remember even though the outside world might be raining, if you keep on smiling the sun will soon show its face and smile back at you.
A smile is the chosen vehicle of all ambiguities.
Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.
Laughter is day, and sobriety is night; a smile is the twilight that hovers gently between both, more bewitching than either.
If you smile when no one else is around, you really mean it.
A kind heart is a fountain of gladness, making everything in its vicinity freshen into smiles.
The happiness of life is made up of minute fractions - the little, soon forgotten charities of a kiss or a smile, a kind look or heartfelt compliment.
I'm really exciting. I smile a lot, I win a lot, and I'm really sexy.
Nobody needs a smile so much as the one who has none to give. So get used to smiling heart-warming smiles, and you will spread sunshine in a sometimes dreary world.
Better by far you should forget and smile that you should remember and be sad.
Wear a smile and have friends; wear a scowl and have wrinkles.
A smile is the universal welcome.
I have witnessed the softening of the hardest of hearts by a simple smile.
It is impossible to persuade a man who does not disagree, but smiles.
But God can only smile because only God can know what is coming next.
She gave me a smile I could feel in my hip pocket.
The flower in the vase smiles, but no longer laughs.
Children learn to smile from their parents.
Smile, for everyone lacks self-confidence and more than any other one thing a smile reassures them.
Youth smiles without any reason. It is one of its chiefest charms.
A smile abroad is often a scowl at home.
Never a lip is curved with pain that can't be kissed into smiles again.
I want to touch the heart of the world and make it smile.
I never smile unless I mean it.
I think that anybody that smiles automatically looks better.
I've always spent more time with a smile on my face than not, but the thing is, I don't write about it.
Courage, not compromise, brings the smile of God's approval.
I was so embarrassed about mispronouncing words. I just knew how to smile.
When I look out at the people and they look at me and they're smiling, then I know that I'm loved. That is the time when I have no worries, no problems.
I have found that a smile and a stick will carry you through all right, and in ninety-nine cases out of a hundred it is the smile that does the trick.
Jesus wept; Voltaire smiled. From that divine tear and from that human smile is derived the grace of present civilization.
As happy a man as any in the world, for the whole world seems to smile upon me!
The company of fools may first make us smile, but in the end we always feel melancholy.
To smile at the jest which plants a thorn in another's breast is to become a principal in the mischief.
And the smile that is worth the praises of earth is the smile that shines through tears.
If you haven't seen your wife smile at a traffic cop, you haven't seen her smile her prettiest.
Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.

Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
